name: AVG
description: Calculates the average of [value] within each group determined by [context].

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Defines the grouping scope (for example, events per attribute, all in view, etc.).

name: AVGIF
description: Calculates the average of [value] for rows meeting [condition], grouped by [context]. Returns [default] when no items match.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Boolean filter applied within the context.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Value used if the condition selects no items.

name: COUNT
description: Counts rows within each group determined by [context].

name: COUNTIF
description: Counts rows that satisfy [condition], grouped by [context]. Returns [default] if none match.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Value used if no matches occur.

name: COUNTUNIQUE
description: Counts distinct values of [value] within each [context] group.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Attribute or expression for distinct counting.

name: COUNTUNIQUEIF
description: Counts distinct values of [value] that satisfy [condition], per [context]. Uses [default] when the condition selects none.

errors: BOOL_REQUIRED: [condition] must evaluate to TRUE/FALSE within the context.

name: MAX
description: Returns the maximum of [value] within each [context] group.

name: MAXIF
description: Returns the maximum of [value] among rows satisfying [condition], per [context]. Uses [default] when none match.

name: MAXVAL
description: Selects the item with the maximum [value1] and returns its [value2], grouped by [context].

parameters.name: value1
parameters.description: Key used for selecting the max item.

parameters.name: value2
parameters.description: Value returned from the selected item.

examples.natural_language: Return the user with the longest event per activity.

name: MAXVALIF
description: Among items satisfying [condition], selects the item with maximum [value1] and returns [value2], grouped by [context]. Uses [default] when none match.

name: MIN
description: Returns the minimum of [value] within each [context] group.

name: MINIF
description: Returns the minimum of [value] among rows satisfying [condition], per [context]. Uses [default] when none match.

name: MINVAL
description: Selects the item with the minimum [value1] and returns its [value2], grouped by [context].

name: MINVALIF
description: Among items satisfying [condition], selects the item with minimum [value1] and returns [value2], grouped by [context]. Uses [default] when none match.

name: RANGE
description: Returns the range (max − min) of [value] per [context] group.

name: RANGEIF
description: Returns the range (max − min) of [value] for items fulfilling [condition], grouped by [context]. Uses [default] when none match.

name: STDEV
description: Calculates the standard deviation of [value] per [context] group.

name: STDEVIF
description: Calculates the standard deviation of [value] restricted by [condition], per [context]. Uses [default] when none match.

name: SUM
description: Sums [value] within each group determined by [context].

name: SUMIF
description: Sums [value] that satisfy [condition], per [context]. Uses [default] when none match.

name: START
description: Returns the start timestamp of the current process/event/case/path, depending on context.

name: END
description: Returns the end timestamp of the current process/event/case/path, depending on context.

name: DURATION
description: Returns the duration of the current process/event/case/path, depending on context.

name: EVENTCOUNT
description: Returns the number of events in the current scope (process or event context).

name: CASECOUNT
description: Returns the number of cases in the process (process context).

name: ACTIVETIME
description: Returns active time of the case (case context).

name: WAITINGTIME
description: Returns waiting time of the case (case context).

name: ISPARALLEL
description: Returns TRUE if parallelism is present—at least one overlapping event in the current case; or for an event, if it overlaps with another.

name: ISPARALLELWITH
description: Returns TRUE if the current event is parallel with another event satisfying [condition].

name: UTILIZATION
description: Returns case utilization (0..1).

name: PARALLELUTILIZATION
description: Returns cumulative case utilization; can exceed 1 when parallel events overlap.

name: REWORKCOUNT
description: Returns total count of reworks (loops and self-loops) within the case; optional attribute defines repetition basis (default is mining attribute).

name: LOOPCOUNT
description: Returns count of loops in the case; optional attribute defines repetition basis (default mining attribute).

name: SELFLOOPCOUNT
description: Returns count of self-loops in the case; optional attribute defines repetition basis (default mining attribute).

name: OCCURRENCE
description: Returns the occurrence index of the event's attribute value within its case; optional attribute selects the repetition basis (default mining attribute).

name: ISSELFLOOP
description: Returns TRUE when the current event/edge has a self-loop repetition for the given attribute (default mining attribute).

name: ISLOOP
description: Returns TRUE when the current event/edge is part of a loop repetition for the given attribute (default mining attribute).

name: ISREWORK
description: Returns TRUE when the current event/edge is a rework (loop or self-loop) for the given attribute (default mining attribute).

name: ISLOOPINFLOW
description: Returns TRUE when the current event/edge has loop inflow for the given attribute (default mining attribute).

name: ISLOOPOUTFLOW
description: Returns TRUE when the current event/edge has loop outflow for the given attribute (default mining attribute).

name: LOOPGAIN
description: Returns +1 if loop outflow without inflow; −1 if inflow without outflow; otherwise 0 (event context).

name: MEDIAN
description: Estimates the median of [value] per [context]; [compression] controls accuracy and memory (20..1000, default 200).

name: QUANTILE
description: Estimates the q-th quantile (0..1) of [value] per [context]; optional [compression] (20..1000, default 200).

name: CDF
description: Estimates the cumulative distribution function for [value] at threshold [x] within [context]; optional [compression] (20..1000, default 200).

name: ISFINISHED
description: Returns TRUE when the case is categorized as finished (per Process Context → Case Categorization).

name: ISRUNNING
description: Returns TRUE when the case is categorized as running (per Process Context → Case Categorization).

name: ISSTUCK
description: Returns TRUE when the case is categorized as stuck (per Process Context → Case Categorization).

name: ISINCOMPLETEIMPORT
description: Returns TRUE when the case is categorized as import incomplete (per Process Context → Case Categorization).

name: TODATE_YMD
description: Creates a DATE from year, month, and day components.

name: TODATE_YMD_HMSMS
description: Creates a DATE from year, month, day and time parts (hour, minute, second, millisecond).

name: TODATE_YMD_TIME
description: Creates a DATE from year, month, day and a TIME argument.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time part as numeric time unit (per docs).

name: TOTIME
description: Creates a TIME interval from hour, minute, second, millisecond parts.

name: TOTIMEFROMDAYS
description: Creates a TIME interval from total days.

name: TOTIMEFROMHOURS
description: Creates a TIME interval from total hours.

name: TOTIMEFROMMINUTES
description: Creates a TIME interval from total minutes.

name: TOTIMEFROMSECONDS
description: Creates a TIME interval from total seconds.

name: TOTIMEFROMMILLIS
description: Creates a TIME interval from total milliseconds.

name: ADDDAYS
description: Adds [count] days to a DATE/TIME.

name: ADDHOURS
description: Adds [count] hours to a DATE/TIME.

name: ADDMILLIS
description: Adds [count] milliseconds to a DATE/TIME.

name: ADDMINUTES
description: Adds [count] minutes to a DATE/TIME.

name: ADDMONTHS
description: Adds [count] months to a DATE/TIME (fractional values ignored).

name: ADDSECONDS
description: Adds [count] seconds to a DATE/TIME.

name: ADDYEARS
description: Adds [count] years to a DATE/TIME (fractional values ignored).

name: DATE
description: Extracts the date component from a DATE (drops time-of-day).

name: DAY
description: Returns the day-of-month from a DATE.

name: DAYOFWEEK
description: Returns the day-of-week (integer) from a DATE.

name: DAYOFYEAR
description: Returns the ordinal day-of-year from a DATE.

name: HOUR
description: Returns the hour from a DATE.

name: MINUTE
description: Returns the minute from a DATE.

name: SECOND
description: Returns the second from a DATE.

name: MILLISECOND
description: Returns the millisecond from a DATE.

name: TIMEOFDAY
description: Returns the time-of-day component as a TIME interval from a DATE.

name: WEEKOFYEAR
description: Returns ISO week-of-year number from a DATE.

name: YEAR
description: Returns the year from a DATE.

name: ISLEAPYEAR
description: Returns TRUE if [year] is a leap year.

name: DAYS
description: Extracts the whole days component from a TIME interval.

name: HOURS
description: Extracts the whole hours component from a TIME interval.

name: MINUTES
description: Extracts the whole minutes component from a TIME interval.

name: SECONDS
description: Extracts the whole seconds component from a TIME interval.

name: MILLISECONDS
description: Extracts the whole milliseconds component from a TIME interval.

name: TOTALDAYS
description: Converts TIME interval to total days (possibly fractional).

name: TOTALHOURS
description: Converts TIME interval to total hours (possibly fractional).

name: TOTALMILLIS
description: Converts TIME interval to total milliseconds (possibly fractional).

name: TOTALMINUTES
description: Converts TIME interval to total minutes (possibly fractional).

name: TOTALSECONDS
description: Converts TIME interval to total seconds (possibly fractional).

name: QUARTER
description: Returns the quarter-of-year from a DATE.

name: ABS
description: Returns the absolute value of the number.

name: CEIL
description: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the given number.

name: FLOOR
description: Returns the greatest integer less than or equal to the given number.

name: MAX2
description: Returns the maximum of two values.

name: MIN2
description: Returns the minimum of two values.

name: LOG
description: Returns the logarithm of [value] to the specified [base].

name: POWER
description: Returns [value] raised to the power [exponent].

name: ROUND
description: Rounds [value] to the specified number of [digits].

name: SIGN
description: Returns −1 if value < 0, 0 if value = 0, 1 if value > 0.

name: SQR
description: Returns the square (second power) of [value].

name: SQRT
description: Returns the square root of [value].

name: TRUNCATE
description: Returns the integer part of [value] (rounded toward zero).

name: CONCAT
description: Concatenates multiple strings.

name: CONTAINS
description: Returns TRUE if [string] contains [value].

name: ENDSWITH
description: Returns TRUE if [string] ends with [value].

name: LEFT
description: Returns the leftmost [count] characters of [string].

name: LEN
description: Returns the length of [string].

name: LOWER
description: Converts [string] to lower case.

name: LTRIM
description: Removes leading whitespace from [string].

name: RIGHT
description: Returns the rightmost [count] characters of [string].

name: RTRIM
description: Removes trailing whitespace from [string].

name: STARTSWITH
description: Returns TRUE if [string] starts with [value].

name: SUBSTRING
description: Returns a substring of [string] starting at [start] with length [count].

name: TOINT
description: Converts [string] to an integer; returns 0 or [default] on conversion error.

name: TOSTRING_INT
description: Converts an INT to a STRING, with optional format pattern.

name: TOSTRING_FLOAT
description: Converts a FLOAT to a STRING, with optional format pattern.

name: TOSTRING_BOOL
description: Converts a BOOL to a STRING ("True" or "False").

name: TOSTRING_DATE
description: Converts a DATE to a STRING using an optional date format.

name: TOSTRING_TIME
description: Converts a TIME interval to a STRING using an optional time format.

name: TRIM
description: Removes whitespace from both ends of [string].

name: UPPER
description: Converts [string] to upper case.

name: GETVALUE
description: Returns the event/case attribute value by its name (useful when attribute names contain spaces).

name: ATTRIBUTENAME_LITERAL
description: Direct reference to an attribute by identifier (without spaces).

name: IF
description: Returns [valueIfTrue] if [condition] is TRUE; otherwise returns [valueIfFalse].

name: SOURCE
description: Changes evaluation context to the initial event of the current path (edges only) for the enclosed [operation].

name: TARGET
description: Changes evaluation context to the ending event of the current path (edges only) for the enclosed [operation].

name: CASECTX
description: Changes evaluation context to the case of the current event/path for the enclosed [operation] (events and paths only).
